cfcouchbase.data
Interface IDataMarshaller

cfcouchbase.data.IDataMarshaller

public interface IDataMarshaller

This is our data marshaller interface for serializing and deserializing objects from Couchbase to CFML and vice-versa

Method Summary
 any deserializeData(string data, [any inflateTo], [boolean deserialize])
          This method deserializes an incoming data string via JSON and according to our rules
 string serializeData(any data)
          This method serializes incoming data according to our rules and it returns a string representation usually JSON
 any setCouchbaseClient(any couchcbaseClient)
          A method that is called by the couchbase client upon creation so if the marshaller implemnts this function, it can talk back to the client
 

Method Detail

deserializeData

public any deserializeData(string data, [any inflateTo], [boolean deserialize])
This method deserializes an incoming data string via JSON and according to our rules. It can also accept an optional inflateTo parameter wich can be an object we should inflate our data to.

Parameters:
data - A JSON document to deserialize according to our rules
inflateTo - The object that will be used to inflate the data with according to our conventions
deserialize - The boolean value that marks if we should deserialize or not. Default is true

serializeData

public string serializeData(any data)
This method serializes incoming data according to our rules and it returns a string representation usually JSON

Parameters:
data - The data to serialize

setCouchbaseClient

public any setCouchbaseClient(any couchcbaseClient)
A method that is called by the couchbase client upon creation so if the marshaller implemnts this function, it can talk back to the client. It must return back itself.

Parameters:
couchcbaseClient
